fields.description: As a cloudformation user, I would like to be able to support UpdateStack with AWS::EC2::Instance

comments.body:
To Test Availability Zone:  Setup a multicluster system.

Create a template with an instance, one of the properties "AvailabilityZone" : "one".  Modify the template to use "AvailabilityZone" : "two".  Update the stack.  Make sure a replacement resource gets generated.

EbsOptimized is not supported.  The value is always false.  However, if the value goes from false to true, on ebs backed instances, an update will occur with no interruption, and with instance store, 'needsReplacement' will occur.  EbsOptimized will always report 'false' as an attribute, however.
ImageId changes will create a replacement resource.

InstanceInitiatedShutdownBehavior is not currently supported.  The value is always "stop", even if the attribute is modified.  However, a change from "stop" to "terminate" will trigger a no-interruption update, but the value will still be "stop" on the instance.
InstanceType will create a replacement if the image is instance-store, some interruption (i.e. instance start/stop) if image is ebs.

KernelId or RamdiskId will require replacement on instance-store instances.  They require simply "some interruption" (stop/start instance) on work on hvm instances.  Do not set kernel/ramdisk ids on hvm instances, however, as bad things might happen like an inconsistent instance state.  The parameters are supported on instance-store, paravirtual images.  In this case, the instance needs to be replaced.  It should be the case, and the right calls are made under the circumstances, that pv ebs instances would be updated without replacement, but eucalyptus does not support this currently.
KeyName changes will create a replacement resource.
PlacementGroupName is not supported, however, changing the value does replace the instance.

PrivateIpAddress requires a replacement, but the ip address must be different as the new instance is spun up before the old one is deleted.  In a VPC environment, the private ip address must be within the subnet range.
SourceDestCheck requires no interruption.
Tenancy changes will cause update replacement, but the value does not appear to be used.
UserData requires some interruption on the ebs case, needs replacement otherwise.  In the some-interruption case, the code will not be executed, however, as in the AWS description.
Tags should update without interruption.
AdditionalInfo is unused but will cause replacement in non-ebs instances, and some interuption in ebs instances if changed.

Don't forget to test an AWS::EC2::EIP and AWS::EC2::EIPAssociation in non-vpc mode for an instance that needs "some interruption".  This means change something like instance type in the instance, and nothing else.  It will stop/start the instance, and if an EIP or EIPAssociation has that instanceid, it should re-attach.

*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.3.0-0.25084.394.20160830git660153b.el7}}
